comment:
I had an unfortunate incident about 2 months ago, still on going all the injuries.  However the one area that was bruised the most was from hitting a stud after being shoved/tossed into a wall.  That bruise lasted 4 weeks and the swelling was extremely noticeable for over 6 weeks.  And no broken bone under that bruise... imagine a broken nose or broken ribs...

So lol let's not forget that anything broken swells up a lot ontop of the bruising.  So yes you can throw makeup over your skin to cover up the discoloration but you cant cover up bruising with makeup.  Also when she stretched out (literally hung from his neck) to kiss Johnny no one, I mean NO ONE! (Even on heavy meds) would habe been able to do that it would be so excruciating.  Most people with broken ribs cant lift their arms over their head its eye level and lower and they cant bend their midsection, no twisting, bending over, leaning...  Shes HANGING from her arms and arching her back.  

On her other photo she is leaping in the air and turning her midsection towards the camera... again excruciating pain she could not have been able to move like that with broken ribs if she truly had broken ribs.  Yes people can mask pain for a photo but meds dont take away everything not without a dr prescription and x rays to see that they are indeed broken.  She had no evidence, no photos, no x rays, no CT, no MRI, only a nurse note that said she disnt show any signs of injury or bruising...  all these photos were candid, meant for personal remembrance, theres no evidence of facial swelling, no evidence of broken ribs or swelling anywhere really she is so thin any swelling would be very noticable on any of her arms and legs.  Theres nothing.  

Shes all smiles and fun meanwhile Johnny is the one that looks like someone that just went thru an ordeal and isnt too comfortable being around the person responsible.  Fake smile, tense, wearing a lot of clothing and sun glasses.  He looks to be the one that may have injuries seriously... pay attention to his posture (very rigid, Johnny has always been loose and comfortable infront of cameras he has an aura about him, in these he seems so uncomfortable and unhappy) look at his facial expressions and how he doesnt lean into amber when she hangs on him look at his posture and face...  these photos to me show a beaten man and there uncomfortable to see.

author: Harley Gale

comment: As much as I don't like the UK decision, I have to respect it like The People Vs. Larry Flynt. The Sun wanted to SELL, whether it was factual or construed. And it DID! Why we're all here today with you. And like Falwell's flock - did they immediately believe Flynt's accusations? No - Jerry is too much of a decent man to have ever done such things! But had Larry Flynt and Hustler LOST that decision, imagine what it would've done to the ENTIRE entertainment industry? And I have to laugh even here about 'mentioning names and getting de-monetized" It's like telling someone a joke, and let them figure out the punchline. Some can, some can't. (The difference between a nun, and a woman in the bath? A nun has 'Hope In Her Soul'...) Some will laugh, some will be disgusted, some will get angry, and more than I care to imagine will say "I don't get it?". So again, I think Johnny's legal team and the UK Judge let The Sun and ALL journalists off the hook for any 'emotional pain and suffering' their 'reporting' and extrapolations and commentary may have caused. Sucks for Johnny, yes. BUT - in the long run, I think it a wise decision. Now it's up to Johnny to prove Amber was SERIOUS about all these accusations with substantial proof. And much like Larry Flynt - her best defense now is "I was joking! I didn't think ANYONE would seriously believe me!"

author: Sheri bitton

comment:
She looks very happy and uninjured as she poses with her ex-husband whom she's apparently so afraid of! 
She would not look this happy if she was being abused and beaten. She's a liar. 

Like in those audio leaks, if she was so afraid of him, why would she want to antagonize and start fights with him? That's not what someone that was afraid of their abuser would do! She is not a victim at all, victims do not act the way she does. 

Let's be real, she looks gorgeous in those photos, she looks strong, very physically fit even. Unfortunately, it's what we don't see that's scarier, we know she is more than capable of hurting someone both physically and mentally. Plus she can clearly pick something up and use it as a weapon too.

She claimed that JD hurt her on the plane but even in a picture taken of them both on the plane with others, she appears once again, completely uninjured. If you look carefully at the said plane picture. It appears that it's Johnny that is injured, there is a small bruise under his eye and he looks red in the face/flustered whilst on the plane. 

I genuinely believe that all the abuse that AH alleges happened to her, did not happen to her but in fact, happened to JD. It's called projection and it's something that people do, especially narcissists. To protect herself from the truth and protect her own reputation and career, she had to twist the truth to make it seem like she was the victim and not JD and because he's a man, nobody will believe him to be a victim which is just wrong! 

It seems she has projected her own behavior and other stories onto JD. She even apparently stole her assistant's tragic survival story and twisted it into her own narrative. The law and media have a biased agenda towards men, AH said nobody would believe JD to be a victim, unfortunately, she was right, for now. 

Hopefully, there is light at the end of this tunnel, it seems the tables are starting to turn as she gets exposed more and more with evidence. This story/case is important for a lot of people especially men because it represents the injustices of male victims who like myself have been too afraid to come forward and be believed because of their gender. Abuse is not gender-specific, I've been a victim too.
